messages.message: I am seeing very different behavior with checkboxes in refiner with the latest release.  I used to be able to have consistency with the checkbox location based on a single root with the check box directly left of the root now I am seeing the checkbox selection area showing up without much of a relationship to the root.  Are there new methods to get check box accuracy?
i tried looking in <#CJ7E9RG7Q|> but couldn’t find recent discussions about a similar issue, maybe @lydia could help?
@Dale DeLoy I’m out today. Is this urgent? In the meantime, can you include a few screenshots of what you mean? Do you have access to an environment with an older release to show a before and after?
I will collect more information on the issue with screen shots and submit it next week
